tool.name: OGS: Layers2Grid
tool.description: Galaxy wrapper for the OGS utility 'Layers2Grid'.

param.name: dilate
param.label: dilate
param.help: assign mat IDs based on single nodes instead of a majority of nodes, which can result in a slightly increased voxel grid extent

param.name: cellsize_z
param.label: cellsize z
param.help: edge length of cubes in z-direction (depth)

param.name: cellsize_y
param.label: cellsize y
param.help: edge length of cubes in y-direction (latitude)

param.name: cellsize_x
param.label: cellsize x
param.help: edge length of cubes in x-direction (longitude) or all directions, if y and z are not set

param.name: input
param.label: input
param.help: the input file list containing the paths the all input layers in correct order from top to bottom

tool.help: This tool runs the **Layers2Grid** utility from the OpenGeoSys suite.
